title: JavaScript Level 1 â€” Basics & Console Output
intro: This level introduces JavaScript syntax, console output and your first few lines of JS code.
points: Understand how JavaScript code is executed by a JS engine (like Node.js or the browser).
Use console.log() to print messages and values.
Write your first JS program with a few console.log statements.
Get familiar with semicolons, braces and indentation style.
Understand the difference between single-line and multi-line comments.
